title: Did Sarah Palin Wonder If Flight 370 ‘Flew Directly to Heaven’?
subtitle: Sarah Palin supposedly speculated that Malaysia Airlines Flight 370 may have disappeared 'because it mistakenly flew too high and ended up in heaven.'
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: Sarah Palin said Malaysia Airlines Flight 370 may have disappeared "because it mistakenly flew too high and ended up in heaven."
